```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
#read in the data
clim <- read.table(here("data/clim.txt"), header = TRUE) %>% 
  clean_names()

#source function(s): 
#almond_model()
source(here("R/almond_model.R"))
```

```{r}
#subset the clim data for monthly averages
clim_avg <- clim %>% 
  group_by(month, year) %>% 
  filter(month == 1 | month == 2) %>% 
  summarise_at(vars(tmax_c, tmin_c, precip), funs(mean(.)))
```
